Akin Lewis bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, na onye na-emepụta ihe.

A mụrụ Lewis na Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria, ma tolite na Zaria Kaduna State Ọ malitere ọrụ omee na 1973, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ sonyere n'otu egwuregwu nke Prọfesọ Bode Sowande, onye na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria na-edu

Ọ bịara pụta ìhè mgbe ọ rụrụ onye ndu na Why Worry a 1980 comedy sitcom na NTA Ibadan o meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri na 1982 dabere na usoro na ihe nkiri mba na Madam Dearest, ihe nkiri 2005 nke Naijiria mepụtara na onye nduzi nke Tade Ogidan
N'ime afọ ndị gafeworonụ, o gosila, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
O tinyere aka na Tinsel, ihe nkiri ncha nke Naijiria nke malitere ịgbasa n'August 2008 na Heroes and Zeroes, ihe nkiri Naijiria 2010 nke Niji Akanni dere na duziri ya
N'October 2010, o meriri ihe nrite Audio Visual Awards (TAVA) maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
Ọ mere mmemme afọ 40 ya na ogbo na Disemba 2013.
